data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Mainpuri, Uttar Pradesh, India to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mainpuri, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,825,275 lost people in  Mainpuri, Uttar Pradesh, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 20,554 believers in the county of Mainpuri.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Mainpuri, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Mainpuri, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Mainpuri. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.section_summary:
the county of Mainpuri, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 1,868,500.

We estimate Mainpuri has 20,554 people who might know Jesus, 22,671 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,825,275 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Mainpuri, Uttar Pradesh, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,847,946 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood
